thread.title: Post office report shows deficiencies, spurs statewide audit | State | southernminn.com
thread.title_full: Post office report shows deficiencies, spurs statewide audit | State | southernminn.com

author: Cari Spencer Minnesota Public Radio News
title: Post office report shows deficiencies, spurs statewide audit | State | southernminn.com
text: An audit of Minnesota post office branches found delayed mail, safety issues and deficiencies in property conditions. Now, the U.S. Postal Service says it will perform an audit of the entire Minnesota-North Dakota District. kAm%96 :?:E:2= 2F5:E =@@ @C6 E92? 2 J62C[ |:??6D@E2?D 92G6 4@>A=2:?65 E@ E96:C =68:D=2E@CD E92E E96J’C6 ?@E C646:G:?8 E96:C >2:= @?
